inputFields.name: capacity
inputFields.description: Usable capacity of a battery used to compute a route. If this in not filled in, we assume it is the same value as the car batteryUsableKwh.

inputFields.name: stateOfCharge
inputFields.description: Current amount of energy in a battery. If this is not filled in, we assume the battery is full and we fill it in with car batteryUsableKwh.

inputFields.name: finalStateOfCharge
inputFields.description: Desired final amount of energy in a battery. If this is not filled in, we assume it is 20% of the car batteryUsableKwh.
